name: Hunt N Seek: Survival Rainbow
description:
Get ready for the hunt and seek of the rainbow beast. You have one chance to transform into an object and hide within the building.
Choose wise and hide carefully or else the monster will find and eat you

HOW TO PLAY:
- Hold and Drag to move in the room
- Jump over to find the best place
- Hold Your breath and be silent when the boxy pass you

GAME FEATURE:
- Fun and easy to play
- Offer multiple skins
- Awesome graphics
- Countless challenges and situation to play

Download Hide N seek: Survival Rainbow and enjoy this fun addictive game.
